statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_medical_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT patient_name, prescribed_medications FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM patient_medical_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE prescribed_medications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_medical_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT patient_name, prescribed_medications FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, address FROM patients WHERE contact_number='1234567890';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE doctor='Dr. Smith' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, dob, address FROM patients WHERE dob>'1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE doctor = 'Dr. Smith' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE prescription_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_healthcare ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT patient_name, dob, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription_date FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, block_hash, timestamp FROM patients JOIN blockchain_healthcare ON patients.patient_id = blockchain_healthcare.patient_id WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE hospital = 'General Hospital';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, address FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND treatment = 'Quarantine';

SELECT Patients.name, Doctors.name FROM Appointments INNER JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE Appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, experience_years FROM Doctors WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' OR status = 'Cancelled';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE prescription IS NOT NULL;
SELECT doctor_name, experience_years FROM Doctors ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM BlockchainData WHERE nonce > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
